article_title: Don Young answers questions about issues in the 2014 election for U.S. House
article_text: As a Christian, I have compassion for those who are truly in need. Many Alaskans fall through the cracks and need assistance. In these situations, I believe in offering a helping hand up, but not a handout. Too often, policies of that sort encourage poor behavior and a lack of self-responsibility. I support policies that require job training or work requirements for receiving benefits and getting individuals back into the workforce, rather than perpetuating a cycle of unemployment and poverty.

article_metadata.description: Alaska Dispatch News asked candidates for statewide office questions on a range of issues. Here are Republican U.S. Rep. Don Young's answers.

og.description: Alaska Dispatch News asked candidates for statewide office questions on a range of issues. Here are Republican U.S. Rep. Don Young's answers.
og.title: Don Young answers questions about issues in the 2014 election for U.S. House

article_summary:
As a Christian, I have compassion for those who are truly in need.
I support policies that require job training or work requirements for receiving benefits and getting individuals back into the workforce, rather than perpetuating a cycle of unemployment and poverty.
Too often, policies of that sort encourage poor behavior and a lack of self-responsibility.
In these situations, I believe in offering a helping hand up, but not a handout.
Many Alaskans fall through the cracks and need assistance.
